special_text:
[i]Mekini Oasis provides fruits and shelter for all, both big and small.[/i]
Create two 1/1 white Mouse creature tokens.
Add two 4/4 green Elephant creature tokens with trample to your bestiary. [i](If you would create a creature token, you may instead put one into play from your bestiary.)[/i]
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
